message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you, and this price reflects its worth.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you're willing to negotiate.  However, $9,500 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $8,500.  This is a fair price considering your valuation of the product and my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm confident this product will bring you significant value beyond $8,500. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
